title: "Scientists trained a neural network to properly name organic molecules"
excerpt: "Russian researchers developed and trained a neural network to generate names for organic compounds in accordance with the IUPAC nomenclature system. Their research shows that modern neural networks are able to efficiently deal with exact algorithmic problems."
